verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: I'm trading my sorrows, I'm trading my pain, I'm laying them down for the joy of the Lord

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I'm trading my sickness I'm trading my shame I'm laying them down for the joy of the Lord

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Yes Lord, yes Lord, yes, yes Lord(3x) newline Amen

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: I am pressed but not crushed, persecuted not abandoned struck down but not destroyed

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: I am blessed beyond the curse for his promise will endure His joy's gonna be my strength

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: Though my sorrows may last for one night...joy comes in the morning!
